text: Nanso Ahasia nuabea Yehoseba11.2 Ɛsono Yehoseba ne na na ɛsono Atalia nso ne na. Na Yehoseba yɛ Ɔsɔfopanyin Yehoia yere (2 Be 22.11). Ɛno nti na otumi de Yoas siee Asɔredan mu a na ɛyɛ ɔsɔfo no pia mu no. a na ɔyɛ ɔhene Yehoram babea no faa Ahasia ba abarimaa ketewa Yoas,11.2 Na Yoas nnii afe nti na wontwaa no nufu ɛ (nkyekyɛmu 31; 12.1). yii no fii ɔhene no mma a anka wɔrebekunkum wɔn no mu. Yehoseba de Yoas ne ne gyigyefo kohintaw pia bi mu, sɛnea Atalia renhu no. Ɛno nti, wɔannya abofra no ankum no.
